Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Description

Why choose WALI? WALI is committed to building high-quality products and mounting solutions for every budget and everyone. From monitor mounts to speaker mounts and projector mounts, our collections achieve the optimal balance between functionality, design, and aesthetics.

STT003

Monitor Stand Riser

What benefits can we get from WALI monitor stand riser?

To create a comfortable viewing position and better healthy posture.

Give more valuable desktop space underneath the stand for storage.

Weight Capacity: 44lbs Dimensions: 14.6″x9.3″ Height Adjustable Levels: 3.9″, 4.7″, 5.5″

Loading Capacity
44lbs 44lbs 50lbs 40lbs 44lbs 44lbs

Material
Metal Metal Metal Metal Metal and Plastic Metal and Plastic

Color
Black Black Black Black Black Black

Height
3.9”-5.5” 4” 5.3” 4.5” 4.3” 4”-5.6”

Storage Drawer
– –
✓

✓

✓

✓

Design: Large 14.6 x 9.3 inches durable metal shelf fit most flat screen display, laptop and printer, maximum support weight up to 44lbs (20kg). Anti-skid rubber pads prevent slipping or damage to your work surface.
Ergonomic: Raise computer monitor, notebook or any device by 3.9 inches, 4.7 inches or 5.5 inches off the desk to create a comfortable viewing position and a healthier sitting position which help reduce stress on the neck and back.
Ventilated: Large sturdy platform with vented holes, this stand will prevent overheating and keep the device running cool.
Organization: Sleek modern black design complements any desk while adding extra space underneath the stand for storage.
Package Includes: WALI 3 Height Adjustable Metal Monitor Stand Riser x 1, experienced and friendly US based customer support available to assist 7 days a week.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

Product Description

Compatible Laptops
10-15.6″

appr. 4 lbs (more stable)
appr. 2.2 lbs
appr. 2 lbs
appr. 5 lbs

Key Features
Heavy & Stable
Minialist & Adjustable
Minimalist
Sit to Stand Working

Suit for any laptop 10 to 15.6 inches – The laptop stand fits all laptops 10 to 15.6 inches, such as notebooks PC computers 10 inches, 11 inches, 12 inches, 13 inches, 13.3 inches, 14 inches, 15 inches, 15.4 inches, 15.6 inches, etc.
Sturdy and portable – The office computer stand is totally made of thickened aluminum alloy, so the stand is sturdier and has less wobbly. The rubber on the holder hands sticks tightly and ensure your laptop stable on the stand. And the rubber feet prevent the stand from slipping on your desktop. Moreover, the stand is detachable and easy to install without tools, so the lightweight laptop stand is really portable.
Ergonomic design – The slim compact stand elevates your laptop by 6-inch to a perfect eye level and prevents you from hunching over your screen, which reduces neck and shoulder pain. Moreover, the edge of the stand is so smooth that protects you from being scratched.
Cooling better and keep desktop organized – The ventilated elevator desk stand only has two holder hands but not a whole flat, so there is more space to enable the heat to vent and keep your notebook computer from overheating. Also, you can organize your office items such as keyboard and mouse under the thin stand.
Detachable and simple installation – The laptop stand can be conveniently disassembled into 3 parts. And You can easily reassemble it again easily.


SOUNDANCE

Let’s Enjoy Healthier Work Style!

Product Description

LORYERGO LEMS06-1 Metal Monitor Stand Riser

Lift Your Screen to an Ergonomic Height

The 3.9-inch height of the laptop stand for desk can bring your display closer to eye level for more comfort and to help encourage a better posture.

Strength and Stability for Your Equipment

The laptop stand for desk is made of heavy-duty metal to support computers, laptops, printers, or monitors up to 44 pounds.

Multi-functional Design for a Better Workspace

The computer monitor stand lifts your equipment above the desktop to provide extra space for storage of office supplies, notebooks, keyboards, or other office accessories

ALL-IN-ONE STAND

The device slot of this laptop stand for desk can be used to display a phone or tablet to keep your personal device close by. No need to invest in a separate phone or tablet stand.

Non-Slip Pads

Each leg is equipped with pads for stability and to protect surfaces from scratches and make it safe when you stack two units together to get your desktop shelf

Ventilated Metal & Safe Round Corner

The metal platform of this monitor stand riser has ventilated holes to allow airflow for your devices. With its round corner, this monitor stand is friendly to children and pets

Curved Legs

The sturdy legs are curved to provide easier access to storage and can support up to 44lbs. Morden designed laptop riser to make your work station nice and lovely!

Model Number
LENS06-1 LEMS03 LEMS03K2 LEMS09 LEMS05 LEMS19

Color
Black Black Black Black Black Black

Material
Metal Metal Metal Wood Plastic Wood Platform and Metal Legs

Weight Capacity
44lb 44lb 44lb 44lb 44lb 44lb

Adjustable
No(Stand Height: 3.66”) Height Adjustable (4.0” / 4.8” / 5.6”) Height Adjustable (4.0” / 4.8” / 5.6”) No (Stand Height: 5.5”) Height Adjustable (5.9”/ 9.5”/ 13.2”) No (Stand Height: 4.72”)

Vents Design for Heat Dissipation – The metal platform of this laptop stand for desk features ventilation holes to aid airflow and heat dissipation. Allowing airflow to your laptop or preventing overheating.
All-in-One Stand – The device slot of this laptop riser for desk can be used to display a phone or tablet to keep your personal device close by. No need to invest in a separate phone or tablet stand thanks to the bonus feature.
Improve Storage Space – Store a keyboard or mouse under the laptop stand for a more organized workspace. You can stack two monitor riser together for a tiered shelf system. The legs have non-slip pads to protect surfaces from scratches.
Ergonomic Design – Raise your monitor stand to a more comfortable eye level with this laptop stand for desk. With 14.56”length, 9.25”depth, and 3.66” height, the stand dimensions work well for a wide variety of laptops and monitors.
Wide Device Compatibility – The monitor stand riser is compatible with multiple devices including laptops, monitors, small printers, game consoles, pc and more. The sturdy metal structure is designed to safely hold up to 44lbs.

Product Description

HUANUO Monitor Stand With Storage Organizer

Have you ever felt pain on your neck and back from looking at your computer screen too long? Have you ever complained about the limited desktop space in your workplace?

HUANUO monitor stand riser with drawer organizer provides a better way to solve these dilemmas!

SUPER DESK ORGANIZER

Designed with different drawers, our HUANUO monitor stand can store almost all the small office supplies, keeping your desk clutter-free. The upper drawer comes with 3 compartments and the lower drawer fully open. You can put small items in the upper drawer while storing documents, paper, magazines beneath.

Orgnizer
2 drawers Underneath 2 tier Underneath

Height Adjutable
X
✓
X X

Material
Mesh metal Metal Metal MDF

【Sturdy Desk Stand with Strengthened Construction】- The “H” shape construction increases the duration. This monitor stand easily hold monitors, printers up to 33lbs. Never worry about the drawer will not be easy to open
【Ergonomic Monitor Stand Riser】- Raise your monitor by 4.6″, helping you to keep a good sitting posture and prevent the possible stress on neck, back and shoulder during your long time work.
【Super Desk Organizer with 2 Drawers】- Store almost all of your small office supplies like pens, notebooks, smart phones, paper, documents etc., keeping your desk neat and tidy. A superb way to save space and decrease clutter
【Pre-assembled Computer Stand】- The monitor stand no assembly needed! Simply take the drawer out of the box , it’s already pre-assembled and ready for action
【Product Dimensions】- 15.8″ in length, 11.8″ in width and 4.6″ in height, ideal for most home and office spaces. Place it on your desk in your home or office to increase your productivity and improve your health and ready for action
